document_data.name: Bloodfreeze Arrow
document_data.mainbody: '''''Bloodfreeze arrow''''' was a [[transmutation]] [[spell]] that transformed a projectile's tip into ice.
document_data.Effects: As mentioned above, ''bloodfreeze arrow'' was cast on a projectile like an arrow or a bolt. It could be cast on those of masterful quality. On successful casting, the tip of the arrow or bolt changed into blue ice. When the projectile was shot and hit somebody, the target did not just suffer from the cold, but could become paralyzed from the [[magic]] of the enchanted projectile.
document_data.Components: ''Bloodfreeze arrow'' required [[verbal]] and [[material component]]s. The latter was the arrow or bolt of masterful quality that was to be enchanted.
